definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Arabis, a genus of Brassica family including cress

sentences.chinese: 没人生来就会使用筷子。

sentences.english: Sucking or chewing on the chopsticks is considered poor manners.
sentences.chinese: 吸吮或咀嚼对筷子被认为是态度恶劣。

sentences.english: This chopstick dance comes from Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 筷子舞起源于蒙古的舞蹈。

sentences.english: The other utensils began to ignore the chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 其他的用具开始忽视筷子。

sentences.english: Chopsticks originated in ancient China and dates back to as early as the Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 筷子的历史起源于中国古代，最早可以追溯到商代。

sentences.english: I was unhandy with forks and knives in the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 刚开始我不习惯使用刀和筷子。

sentences.english: Chopsticks and spoon can be put in special seat, or put on paper sets.
sentences.chinese: 筷子与汤匙可放在专用的座子上，或放在纸套中。

sentences.english: North American rock cress having very long curved pods.
sentences.chinese: 北美的一种筷子芥属植物，荚果长，弯曲。

sentences.english: The chopsticks are sealed inside a paper bag along with a piece of napkin.
sentences.chinese: 一个密封的纸袋内，有一双筷子，还有一块餐巾。

sentences.english: Also, most restaurant¬s use the hated melamine chopsticks for dine-in.
sentences.chinese: 同时，大部分餐馆使用含有三聚氰胺的筷子就餐。

sentences.english: Thrusting the chopsticks into the food to pick it up.
sentences.chinese: 不要将筷子插入食物以将其叉起。

sentences.english: Firstly, and most importantly, don't put your chopsticks upright in the rice bowl.
sentences.chinese: 最为重要的是，不要把筷子直插在饭碗里。

sentences.english: His low voice's mentioning, that chopsticks also lightly ran into expensive rare twice of lipses.
sentences.chinese: 他低声的说着，那筷子也轻轻碰到了贵生的双唇。

sentences.english: I used chopsticks to unclog the drain.
I had chapped lips and I thought I was using chapstick .
sentences.chinese: 我的嘴唇被撕破我以为是长期使用筷子。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
